alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 10:00AM EDT until March 23 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EDT FOR FRANKLIN COUNTY... At 959 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Eastpoint to near Carrabelle to 10 miles east of St George Island, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, St George Island St Pk, Green Point, Lanark Village, Creels and Hays Place. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
